sql.query:
SELECT COUNT(id) AS count
FROM users
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(userid)) FROM user_logs WHERE created >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 DAY' and activity = 'Valid login'

SELECT activity, data, created
FROM user_logs ORDER BY created DESC LIMIT 50

SELECT u.month, COALESCE(a.count, 0) AS count
FROM
(
    SELECT to_char(generate_series(min(u.created), max(NOW()+'1 month'), '1 month')::date, 'YYYY-MM') AS month FROM users AS u
) u
LEFT JOIN
(
    SELECT to_char(a.date_agg, 'YYYY-MM') AS date_agg, a.count 
    FROM
    (
		SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', users.created) AS date_agg, COUNT(1) AS count
		FROM users
		LEFT JOIN user_permissions ON user_permissions.userid = users.id
		WHERE user_permissions.role IS DISTINCT FROM 'admin'
		GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('month', users.created)
    ) a
) a
ON a.date_agg = u.month
ORDER BY u.month;

SELECT u.month, COALESCE(a.count, 0) AS count
FROM
(
    SELECT to_char(generate_series(min(u.created), max(NOW()+'1 month'), '1 month')::date, 'YYYY-MM') AS month FROM users AS u
) u
LEFT JOIN
(
    SELECT to_char(a.date_agg, 'YYYY-MM') AS date_agg, COUNT(*) AS count 
    FROM
    (
        SELECT DISTINCT DATE_TRUNC('month', user_logs.created) AS date_agg, data
        FROM user_logs
		LEFT JOIN user_permissions ON user_permissions.userid = user_logs.userid
		WHERE user_permissions.role IS DISTINCT FROM 'admin' AND user_logs.activity = 'Valid login'
    ) a
    GROUP BY date_agg
) a
ON a.date_agg = u.month
ORDER BY u.month;

SELECT u.month, COALESCE(a.count, 0) AS count
FROM
(
    SELECT to_char(generate_series(min(u.created), max(NOW()+'1 month'), '1 month')::date, 'YYYY-MM') AS month FROM users AS u
) u
LEFT JOIN
(
    SELECT to_char(a.date_agg, 'YYYY-MM') AS date_agg, COUNT(*) AS count 
    FROM
    (
        SELECT DISTINCT DATE_TRUNC('month', user_logs.created) AS date_agg, data
        FROM user_logs
		LEFT JOIN user_permissions ON user_permissions.userid = user_logs.userid
		WHERE user_permissions.role IS DISTINCT FROM 'admin' AND user_logs.activity = 'Password reset request'
    ) a
    GROUP BY date_agg
) a
ON a.date_agg = u.month
ORDER BY u.month;

SELECT u.month, COALESCE(a.count, 0) AS count
FROM
(
    SELECT to_char(generate_series(min(u.created), max(NOW()+'1 month'), '1 month')::date, 'YYYY-MM') AS month FROM users AS u
) u
LEFT JOIN
(
    SELECT to_char(a.date_agg, 'YYYY-MM') AS date_agg, COUNT(*) AS count 
    FROM
    (
        SELECT DISTINCT DATE_TRUNC('month', user_logs.created) AS date_agg, data
        FROM user_logs
		LEFT JOIN user_permissions ON user_permissions.userid = user_logs.userid
		WHERE user_permissions.role IS DISTINCT FROM 'admin' AND user_logs.activity = 'Incorrect password'
    ) a
    GROUP BY date_agg
) a
ON a.date_agg = u.month
ORDER BY u.month;
